price: Kuma a lõkacin da suka* bayyana ga Jãlũta da rundunoninsa, suka ce: "Yã Ubangijinmu! Ka zuba haƙuri a kanmu kuma Ka tabbatar da sãwayenmu, kuma Ka taimake mu a kan mutãnen nan kãfirai."
arabic: وَلَمَّا بَرَزُواْ لِجَالُوتَ وَجُنُودِهِۦ قَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ أَفۡرِغۡ عَلَيۡنَا صَبۡرٗا وَثَبِّتۡ أَقۡدَامَنَا وَٱنصُرۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: * Dãwũdu ɗan Ãisha ya gãji annabcin Shamwĩlu da mulkin Ɗãlũta, shĩ ne ya fãra haɗã su a cikin Bani lsrã'ila bãyansa sai ɗansa Sulaimãn ya gãje shi haka nan. Yawan mutãnen Ɗãlũta da suka yi yãƙi kamar adadin mutãnen Badar ne waɗanda suka yi yãƙi tãre da Annabi, tsĩra da aminci su tabbata a gare shi.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
